amendment.description: Amendment clarifies DOE's responsibility to protect non-Federal employees from whistleblower retaliation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used in contravention of section 4712 of title 41, United States Code.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Speier amendment (A043) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Speier amendment (A043) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A043) offered by Ms. Speier.
